Bash(for t in tx tx_account tx_activities tx_addresses tx_instruction tx_party tx_pool tx_program tx_sol_balance_change tx_swaps tx_token tx_token_balance_change tx_token_holder tx_token_market tx_token_price tx_tokens tx_transaction_signer tx_transfer tx_transfers)
Bash(do echo '-- $t table' docker exec t16o_v1_mysql mysql -uroot -prootpassword t16o_db -N -e 'SHOW CREATE TABLE $t\G')
